headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions (BR): Is the Stock Undervalued After Recent Pullback?
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions (BR) has seen its stock slip 7% over the past month, even as its year-to-date return remains positive. Investors may be taking a closer look at the company’s fundamentals in light of these recent moves. See our latest analysis for Broadridge Financial Solutions. After a modest pullback this month, Broadridge’s longer-term story remains compelling. The company has achieved a one-year total shareholder return of 10.4%.
